name: playwright-raksul-test

scripts.test:local:chromium: cross-env ENV=dev CI=false npx playwright test --project=E2E-TEST-ON-CHROMIUM
scripts.test:local:firefox: cross-env ENV=dev CI=false npx playwright test --project=E2E-TEST-ON-FIREFOX
scripts.test:ci:chromium: cross-env ENV=dev CI=true npx playwright test --project=E2E-TEST-ON-CHROMIUM
scripts.test:ci:firefox: cross-env ENV=dev CI=true npx playwright test --project=E2E-TEST-ON-FIREFOX
